Description: TRANSCRIPTION, R-LOOPS, AND RNA SPLICING IN EWING SARCOMA DE-OBLIGATE FUNDS TO CLOSE AWARD 1. PER SECTION 711 OF THE NATIONAL DEFENSE AUTHORIZATION ACT (NDAA) 2019, THE US ARMY MEDICAL RESEARCH ACQUISITION ACTIVITY (USAMRAA), US ARMY MEDICAL RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT COMMAND (USAMRDC) TRANSFERRED TO THE DEFENSE HEALTH AGENCY (DHA) FROM THE U.S. ARMY EFFECTIVE 01 OCTOBER 2022. THIS MODIFICATION REFLECTS CHANGES CONSISTENT WITH THE TRANSFER TO DHA. 2. DIVISION II HAS BEEN UPDATED TO SUPERSEDE DIVISION III, PART 2, SECTION C, 2.B. ELECTRONIC PAYMENT INSTRUCTIONS
TRANSCRIPTION, R-LOOPS, AND RNA SPLICING IN EWING SARCOMA
CONSTRUCTION AND FURNISHING OF ADDITIONAL FISHER HOUSES
